print.color
Class ColoredPrinterWIN.Builder

java.lang.Object
  print.color.ColoredPrinterWIN.Builder
Enclosing class:
ColoredPrinterWIN
public static class ColoredPrinterWIN.Builder
extends java.lang.Object

Builder pattern: allows the caller to specify the attributes that it wants to change and keep the default values in the others.

Constructor Summary

          The Colored Printer created, by default, has no format.

Constructor Detail

ColoredPrinterWIN.Builder

public ColoredPrinterWIN.Builder(int level,
                                 boolean tsFlag)
The Colored Printer created, by default, has no format. So it's just like a usual Printer PrinterI.

Parameters:
level - specifies the maximum level of debug this printer can print.
tsFlag - true, if you want a timestamp before each message.
